Frédéric Chopin

Four Mazurkas, op. 67

1835 (nos. 1, 3), 1846 (no. 4), 1849 (no. 2) · Chomiński 92–95 · Brown 93 (nos. 1, 3), 163 (no. 4), 167 (no. 2)

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 7'

  • 1. G major
  • 2. G minor
  • 3. C major
  • 4. A minor

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 264 · Mazurken · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • Henle · HN 288 · Mazurken · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • National Edition · 25 (B I) · Mazurkas (B) · ed. Jan Ekier [no. 4 in two versions]

1. G major

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 3

2. G minor

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2

3. C major

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

4. A minor

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2
